original: @122a # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @122a # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i tsakra samba ra mandala mam ga la g'a th'a ;
analyzed: shr'i tsakra samba ra mandala mam ga la g'a th'a ;
translated: Śrīcakraśamvara-maṇḍala-maṅgala-gāthā

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa /
translated: The Verses of Auspiciousness of the Glorious Wheel of Supreme Bliss Mandala

original: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious Wheel of Supreme Bliss.

original: bkra shis gang zhig chos kyi dbyings las nges byung zhing //
analyzed: bkra shis gang zhig chos kyi dbyings las nges byung zhing //
translated: The auspiciousness that arises from the dharmadhātu,

original: he ru ka dpal 'jigs byed rgyal po 'bar pa'i sku //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal 'jigs byed rgyal po 'bar pa'i sku //
translated: The blazing body of glorious Heruka, the king of terrifying ones,

original: shes rab phag mo'i padmor rdo rje rol mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: shes rab phag mo'i padmor rdo rje rol mdzad pa'i //
translated: Who plays with the vajra in the lotus of Prajñāpārāmitā,🔽By that truth, may there be auspiciousness abiding in Supreme Bliss.

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig phyogs kyi padmo'i 'dab ma la //
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig phyogs kyi padmo'i 'dab ma la //
translated: The auspiciousness that on the lotus petals of the directions,

original: rigs kyi yum bzhi dpa' bo'i phyogs bzhi'i zhal la gzigs //
analyzed: rigs kyi yum bzhi dpa' bo'i phyogs bzhi'i zhal la gzigs //
translated: The four family mothers gaze at the four faces of the hero,

original: padmo mu khyud gri gug phreng bas rnam par mdzes//
analyzed: padmo mu khyud gri gug phreng bas rnam par mdzes//
translated: Adorned with a lotus garland and a garland of flaying knives,🔽By that truth, may there be auspiciousness abiding in Supreme Bliss.

original: @122b bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig mtshams kyi padmo'i 'dab ma la //
analyzed: @122b bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig mtshams kyi padmo'i 'dab ma la //
translated: The auspiciousness that on the lotus petals of the intermediate directions,

original: byang chub sems dang tsandan dri chen gur kum chus //
analyzed: byang chub sems dang tsandan dri chen gur kum chus //
translated: Bodhicitta, great sandalwood, human flesh, and saffron water,🔽

original: gang ba'i snod bzhi dpa' bo'i zhal la reg par mdzod //
analyzed: gang ba'i snod bzhi dpa' bo'i zhal la reg par mdzod //
translated: The hero should touch his mouth to the four vessels filled with bodhicitta, sandalwood, great feces, and saffron water.

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog ;
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog ;
translated: By that truth, may there be auspicious excellence abiding in supreme bliss.

original: / bkra shis gang zhig nam mkha'i gnas nas legs spyod pa'i //
analyzed: / bkra shis gang zhig nam mkha'i gnas nas legs spyod pa'i //
translated: The auspiciousness that is well-practiced from the abode of space,

original: 'khor lo sngon po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud rdo rje phreng //
analyzed: 'khor lo sngon po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud rdo rje phreng //
translated: the blue wheel with eight spokes and a vajra garland on the rim,

original: gnas la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
analyzed: gnas la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
translated: the hero and heroine play in non-dual union in the places and so forth.🔽By that truth, may there be auspicious excellence abiding in supreme bliss.

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig sa stengs gnas nas legs spyod pa'i //
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig sa stengs gnas nas legs spyod pa'i //
translated: The auspiciousness that is well-practiced from the abode of the earth's surface,

original: 'khor lo dmar po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud padmo'i phreng //
analyzed: 'khor lo dmar po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud padmo'i phreng //
translated: the red wheel with eight spokes and a lotus garland on the rim,

original: zhing la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
analyzed: zhing la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
translated: the hero and heroine play in non-dual union in the fields and so forth.🔽By that truth, may there be auspicious excellence abiding in supreme bliss.

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig sa 'og gnas nas legs spyod pa'i //
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig sa 'og gnas nas legs spyod pa'i //
translated: The auspiciousness that is well-practiced from the abode below the earth,

original: 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud 'khor lo'i phreng //
analyzed: 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud 'khor lo'i phreng //
translated: The white wheel with eight spokes and a surrounding rim.

original: 'du la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
analyzed: 'du la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
translated: In the gathering and so forth, the hero and heroine play in nonduality.🔽By that truth, may there be auspiciousness abiding in supreme bliss.

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi mtshams rnams su //
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi mtshams rnams su //
translated: The auspiciousness that in the four gates and intermediate directions of the maṇḍala

original: khva gdong la sogs ma mo yid 'phrog gzugs gnyis ldan //
analyzed: khva gdong la sogs ma mo yid 'phrog gzugs gnyis ldan //
translated: the two forms of the captivating mātṛkās, such as Kākāsyā,

original: thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzad gdug pa kun 'dul ba'i //
analyzed: thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzad gdug pa kun 'dul ba'i //
translated: compassionately benefit migrating beings and tame all evil ones.🔽By that truth, may there be auspiciousness abiding in supreme bliss.🔽The auspiciousness that is the perfection of the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi rnams dang // yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang dang dbang po stobs //
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi rnams dang // yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang dang dbang po stobs //
translated: the four correct renunciations, the bases of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers,

original: byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs rdzogs pa'i //
analyzed: byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs rdzogs pa'i //
translated: and the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment.🔽By that truth, may there be auspiciousness abiding in supreme bliss.

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig rin chen pha gus mdzes pa'i gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig rin chen pha gus mdzes pa'i gzhal yas khang //
translated: The auspiciousness of the immeasurable palace beautified with jeweled cornices,

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ni rab tu brgyan gyur pa'i //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ni rab tu brgyan gyur pa'i //
translated: Adorned with the five sense pleasures,

original: mu tig phreng ba gser gyi dril bu rnga yab legs dpyangs 'phyar //
analyzed: mu tig phreng ba gser gyi dril bu rnga yab legs dpyangs 'phyar //
translated: With pearl garlands, golden bells, and well-suspended yak-tail whisks,🔽By that truth, may there be auspicious excellence!

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig rta babs padma chos kyi 'khor lo gdugs //
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig rta babs padma chos kyi 'khor lo gdugs //
translated: The auspiciousness of the gateways, lotus, Dharma wheel, parasol,

original: mdzes pa'i ri dags dang bcas ba dan bcu drug legs 'phyar zhing //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i ri dags dang bcas ba dan bcu drug legs 'phyar zhing //
translated: With beautiful deer, and sixteen banners well raised,

original: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu dag @123a * //
analyzed: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu dag @123a * //
translated: From the bells swaying in the wind,

original: las chos kyi sgra 'byung ba //
analyzed: las chos kyi sgra 'byung ba //
translated: The sound of Dharma arises.🔽By that truth, may there be auspicious excellence!

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig yongs su bskor ba'i dur khrod brgyad rnams su //
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig yongs su bskor ba'i dur khrod brgyad rnams su //
translated: The auspiciousness of the eight charnel grounds completely surrounding,

original: phyogs skyong shing chen mchod rten brgyad ni gnas pa la //
analyzed: phyogs skyong shing chen mchod rten brgyad ni gnas pa la //
translated: In the eight great trees of the directional guardians, the eight stupas,

original: gdong brnyan ldan zhing zhing skyong brgyad ni kun nas gnas gyur pa //
analyzed: gdong brnyan ldan zhing zhing skyong brgyad ni kun nas gnas gyur pa //
translated: With faces, the eight field guardians are completely present.

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig ye shes me brgyad rab tu 'bar gyur pa //
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig ye shes me brgyad rab tu 'bar gyur pa //
translated: The auspiciousness of the eight blazing fires of wisdom

original: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sprin chen brgyad ni 'dus gyur pa //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sprin chen brgyad ni 'dus gyur pa //
translated: Gathering into the eight great clouds of the nature of bodhicitta,

original: dga' po la sogs klu chen brgyad rnams kun nas gnas gyur pa //
analyzed: dga' po la sogs klu chen brgyad rnams kun nas gnas gyur pa //
translated: The eight great nāgas beginning with Nanda abiding in all directions,🔽By this truth may there be the auspiciousness of abiding in supreme bliss.

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig thugs rje'i rang bzhin chu chen brgyad 'bab cing //
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig thugs rje'i rang bzhin chu chen brgyad 'bab cing //
translated: The auspiciousness of the eight great rivers of compassion flowing,

original: dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis gang //
analyzed: dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis gang //
translated: Filled with the assemblies of heroes, yoginīs, and ḍākinīs,

original: 'dre dang sha za gnod sbyin 'byung po nye bar bsten pa yi //
analyzed: 'dre dang sha za gnod sbyin 'byung po nye bar bsten pa yi //
translated: With bhūtas, piśācas, yakṣas, and bhūtas in attendance,🔽By this truth may there be the auspiciousness of abiding in supreme bliss.

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig rdo rje'i sa gzhir ba gur //
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig rdo rje'i sa gzhir ba gur //
translated: The auspiciousness of the vajra ground, the vajra tent,

original: rdo rje bla bres kun nas bres shing mda' yi ra bar ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje bla bres kun nas bres shing mda' yi ra bar ldan //
translated: The vajra canopy above, and the vajra fence all around,

original: ye shes me ri phreng bas kun nas yongs bskor ba'i //
analyzed: ye shes me ri phreng bas kun nas yongs bskor ba'i //
translated: And the garland of the surrounding flames of wisdom,

original: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi bkra shis shog / dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa /
analyzed: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi bkra shis shog / dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa /
translated: By that truth, may there be auspiciousness for those who abide in supreme bliss.🔽The auspicious verses of glorious Cakrasaṃvara are completed.

original: kha che'i yul du byung zhing dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: kha che'i yul du byung zhing dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: Composed by the precious master who attained siddhi and originated from Kashmir.

original: // / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: // / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o //
translated: Translated by the Tibetan translator, the monk Tshültrim Gyalwa.

original: 'di'i zhu dag dang srung ba'i 'khor lo'i kha skong rnams 'phags pas bgyis lags so//
analyzed: 'di'i zhu dag dang srung ba'i 'khor lo'i kha skong rnams 'phags pas bgyis lags so//
translated: The corrections and additions to the protection wheel were made by Ārya.
